description: You won't believe how easy it is to make your stuffing for Thanksgiving dinner using the Instant Pot. This Mashed Potato Stuffing recipe comes out incredibly moist and full of flavour using the pot-in-pot technique. Includes instructions for oven baking for those without an Instant Pot.
keywords: Instant Pot Stuffing, Mashed Potato Stuffing
name: Instant Pot Stuffing (Mashed Potato Stuffing)
recipeIngredient: 5 slices wholegrain bread (4 cups torn / cubed)

recipeInstructions.text: Place a large heavy-bottomed frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the butter to the frying pan.

Once the butter is melted, add the diced onion and celery to the pan, and sauté until the onions are translucent - about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside.*Note that this step can also be done in the Instant Pot using the sauté function.
Combine the torn bread and mashed potatoes in a large bowl.
Add the onions and celery, ensuring you scrape all of the melted butter into the bowl as well.
Add the thyme, sage, sugar, salt, and pepper.
Mix well, taste, and adjust seasonings if necessary.
